page.title: 17Fruit Picking
page.content: In our area there are 3 main fruit growing farms.One of them is Hadlow Stair Farm.You could pick your own fruit or you could buy the fruit already picked and packed in little plastic cartons covered with cellophane.The farm grew all different sorts of fruit.Here is a list of the fruit and the prices. Gooseberries 25p or 45p. Blackberries 25p or 45p. Loganberries 35p or 40p. The second fruit farm is the College.The people who pick the fruit pick Strawberries,Raspberries and Loganberries.In greenhouses they grow flowers,trees,shrubs and cabbages.My mum works at the College and she picks the fruit there. The third fruit farm grows similar fruit to Hadlow Stair Farm. All three farms grow apples.
